summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 2nd Avenue Northeast, from East 77th Street to East 82nd Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10453 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said payable by the mode of Payment by Bonds.
